item.title: Functional Programming in Scala
item.description: Functional programming (FP) finally goes mainstream. It is not a new concept, but it is absolutely a complex one for beginners including me. I got exposed to a large set of references, online courses and books, and I will try to organize them in a useful way. Why Functional Programming (FP)? Why Scala? I enjoyed the talk given by Martin Odersky, which answer the two key questions with very simple code examples.
